Map116.Event[16].Page[0].list.message[0]: "They will create an idol out of our fears!"
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[0]: "Greetings sister. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[1]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[2]: "Greetings brother. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[3]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[4]: "Is there something you would like to know?"
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[6]: "Tell me which god do you serve?"
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[8]: "Where there is creation, there must be destruction. Such
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[9]: "Common folk often portray Gro-goroth as a being of evil
or entity that must be avoided by all costs."
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[11: "Sylvian, the goddess... She once loved us so..."
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[13: "That is when lust, sex and addiction take a form of
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[14: "Alll-Mer is the most recent of all the older gods."
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[15: "But that is only because he made himself apparent at such
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[16: "He has existed for aeons as a seed of his father."
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[17: "Yes, there are countless older gods less known in these
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[18: "God of the Depths has an especially strong influence in
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[19: "The older gods have left this earth for us to suffer.
There are but traces of them left anymore."
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[20: "That is why many are turning their hopes for the new
gods. But many fail to see their path to ruin."
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[22: "The new gods offer new values. Values of greed, lust for
power, inhibition of sex and desperate seek for new
Map116.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[23: "Hm. So it is so - there is not room for all of us,

Map116.Event[23].Page[0].list.message[0]: "They will create an idol out of our fears!"
Map116.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[0]: "Greetings sister. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map116.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[1]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map116.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[2]: "Greetings brother. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map116.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[3]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map116.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[4]: "I am a wretched worshipper of Alll-Mer, the ascended one,
the christ, the one who died for our sins."
Map116.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[5]: "On the empty scrolls I wrote the name of our savior -
Map116.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[6]: "As the next verse I would plead him - GIVE..."
Map116.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[7]: "As the final, third verse, I would ask for CHEESE,
LANTERN, SHORT SWORD or even a book about our christ."
Map116.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[8]: "I could ask for anything and that is exactly what I would

Map116.Event[259].Page[0].list.message[0: "This place is one of the reasons I delved down here."
Map116.Event[259].Page[0].list.message[1: "Since the beginning of our time, they have kept recording
the events, sciences, knowledge and more..."
Map116.Event[259].Page[0].list.message[5: "They've been passing on the torch of enlightenment for
Map116.Event[259].Page[0].list.message[8: "How about reading something instead of talking to me and
maybe you might just get it?"
Map116.Event[259].Page[0].list.message[9: "You must know him. He is Valteil the Enlightened one."
Map116.Event[259].Page[0].list.message[1: "A whole lifetime wouldn't be enough to browse through this
Map116.Event[259].Page[2].list.message[0: "This place is one of the reasons I delved down here."
Map116.Event[259].Page[2].list.message[1: "Let me know if you find anything interesting."
Map116.Event[259].Page[2].list.message[2: "I think I can continue for now..."
Map116.Event[259].Page[2].list.message[3: "I'm not done here. Besides, you seem to have plenty of
